revision.comment: Stock firmware data from onhand deviceU
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ionics EMS |model=Stratus |manuf_country=Philippines |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=03/07/2011 |fcc_id=Y6SSTRTSWFX00 |type=plug computer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G084QE-HCF7 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, USB Female Mini-B |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B |wi1_module=Samsung SWB-M12 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8686 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bg |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1;,,, Dual USB to Serial UART/FIFO;FTDI;FT2232D;;1;,,, Quad 3-State Noninverting Buffer;ON Semiconductor;MC74HC125A;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Micrel;MIC2026-1YM;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.26;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;Debian 5.0 |oui_eth=00:26:DB }} Composed of 4 circuit boards: * Power board * Processor Board silkscreened with "PLUG_COMPUTER_MIDSIZE_B00" * JTAG Board silkscreened with "PlugComputer_Midsize_JTAG_Rev.B0" * WIFI Board silkscreened with "PLUG COMPUTER WIFI B00"
The unit used for this entry varies from that shown in the FCC photos using a different USB Hub and WiFi antenna.
